comment.author: 47758274@N04
comment._content:
General Minier built the Rogues' Harbor Inn (then the Central Exchange Hotel) in Lansing NY from 1830- 1836
We've been searching for a portrait of him for many years...
Eastman House & Google you have made our day!!!

comment.author: 43758249@N08
comment._content:
The unusual looking hat is actually a device used back then for visually tracking regimental troop movements.

Or not.
